description: This table stores modifiers associated with a supply (from the related multiple Supply Modifiers (I ORD 52403) item).

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the order record associated with this procedure order.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number of the associated supply in this supply modifier record. Together with ORDER_ID, this forms the foreign key to the ORDER_SUPPLY table.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple supply modifiers that are associated with the supply and the order id from the ORDER_SUPPLY table.

columns.name: SUPPLY_MODIFIERS_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the modifiers for a supply charge.

columns.name: SUPPLY_MODIFIERS_ID_MODIFIER_NAME
columns.description: The name of the modifier record.
